channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: 70-87 millard road, 10th September
item.description:
Bin room full of rubbish causing smell. Been like this for over a month now, people end up throwing their rubbish on the floor which causes rodents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70-87, Millard Road, New Cross, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves, 10th September
item.description:
First reported the issue of the leaves on 1/9/25 on FixMyStreet ref: 8102488 - but on the 2/9/25 you stated it has been resolved. As you can see from the pictures taken today - this has not been resolved. Also Peabody has not mowed the lawn nor has Bexley Council swept the area which was due the third week cleaning cycle on 8/9/25, yesterday. Again can this be expedited. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whernside Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy manhole cover on Camden Rd prevents sleep, 10th September
item.description:
There is a rocking manhole cover on Camden Rd near intersection with Rochester Pl, which makes a loud banging noise when cars drive over it. Previously reported in https://www.fixmystreet.com/report/8002856, but it has been closed without an action
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camden Road, Kentish Town, London

item.title: Mobile bike repair unit resurfaced, 9th September
item.description:
